content: Jed York leveraged Jim Harbaugh’s success to expedite a new stadium. Jed is a business man who doesn’t quite understand how people work. Eddy D ought to teach Jed a few pointers. But that’s another whole conversation. This stadium was rushed. Candlestick was a dump, but the stick was nostalgic. The 49ers have made only forgettable memories thus far at Levi’s. Maybe if the 49ers turn fortunes around, we won’t worry about the stadium as much itself as we can then focus on the product on the field as opposed to just the field itself. But that may be a while…
